name: PeopleSoft: Developers should not build long pages that are longer than 5 pages
description: Despite the rule name aligned with PeopleSoft best pratices, the maximum Page Height is a parameter that can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all the Pages having a Height above 5 times the standard.
It provides the following information: 
-  Page  full name.
- The associated value is the PageHeight.
rationale: Improve look & feel for the user
